document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 98-11
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AUTHORIZING AN AMENDMENT TO THE CONTRACT BETWEEN THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AND THE BOARD OF ADMINISTRATION OF THE CALIFORNIA PUBLIC EMPLOYEES' RETIREMENT SYSTEM TO PERMIT CITY EMPLOYEES TO BUY BACK RETIREMENT CREDIT FOR PREVIOUS MILITARY SERVICE PURSUANT TO GOVERNMENT CODE SECTION 21024
